content: <style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, your new outfit looks great! Need some... {A灵光一现}fabric softener, baa?

content: For me, keeping clothes all floofalicious is the secret to keeping my mood just as floofalicious. I'll share some with you... baa.
